Shumaker is proud to have 135 lawyers recognized in the 2024 editions of Best Lawyers in America® and the Best Lawyers: Ones to Watch in America™. Of the lawyers listed, 106 were selected for inclusion in Best Lawyers and 29 were included in Best Lawyers: Ones to Watch, which recognizes lawyers who are early in their careers for their outstanding professional excellence in private practice. Additionally, nine lawyers received the "Lawyer of the Year" designation. "Lawyer of the Year" is awarded annually to only one lawyer per practice area in each geographic region who received overwhelming feedback from their peers, making it an exceptional accolade.

Since it was first published in 1983, Best Lawyers has become universally regarded as the definitive guide to legal excellence. Best Lawyers honors the professional accomplishments of the top legal talent based on an exhaustive peer-review evaluation. For the 2024 edition, more than 17 million votes were analyzed, resulting in more than 71,000 leading lawyers being included in the new edition. Lawyers are not required or allowed to pay a fee to be listed; therefore, inclusion in Best Lawyers is considered a singular honor.
